QuestData.Title: The Crowley Orchard
QuestData.Description: Of course you remember Lord Darius Crowley's daughter, Lorna.$B$BShe never quite recovered after losing her father in Gilneas City. She's basically led the life of a hermit. The only visitor she's allowed into her house has been Krennan... and he won't say a word about the whole thing.$B$BSend word to her about the evacuation.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Lorna Crowley at the Crowley Orchard.
QuestData.RewardText: Stay back! Don't make me...$B$BIs it you? By the Light! It's you, $n!
